DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study 14C-GDC-0810 After Single Oral Administration Healthy Female Participants
DOC.criteria: Healthy participant nonchild bear potential , nonpregnant , nonlactating either postmenopausal surgically sterile . Negative pregnancy test result Screening Day 1 . Body mass index 18.5 29.9 kilogram per square meter . Healthy condition document clinically significant finding laboratory evaluation , medical history , 12lead electrocardiogram , vital sign . Significant history metabolic , allergic , dermatological , hepatic , renal , hematological , pulmonary , cardiovascular , gastric , neurological , psychiatric disorder . History significant hypersensitivity allergy drug . Uncontrolled hypothyroidism . History presence clinically significant abnormal electrocardiogram . History venous thrombosis , endometrial disorder , thrombophilic condition , inflammatory bowel disease , chronic diarrhoea , active latent tuberculosis , Gilbert 's syndrome . Major surgical procedure significant traumatic injury within 3 month prior study participation . Participation one radiolabeled investigational drug study within 12 month prior Checkin ( Day 1 ) . Exposure significant radiation occur within 12 month prior Checkin ( Day 1 ) . Any acute chronic condition would limit participant 's ability participate clinical study . Failure satisfy Investigator fitness participate reason .
